author: Joshua Caplan, Joshua Caplan
title: Gov. Ron DeSantis Issues 'Stay at Home' Order for All of Florida
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis (R) on Wednesday issued a "stay at home" order for the state to fight the spread of the Chinese coronavirus.
content:
Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis (R) on Wednesday issued a “stay at home” order across the state to fight the spread of the Chinese coronavirus.
“I’m gonna be doing an executive order today directing all Floridians to limit movements and personal interactions outsi… [+970 chars]
